TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PolygonHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class PolygonHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class PolygonHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: 在 控件中定义多边形作用点区域。

span.span: Defines a polygon-shaped hot spot region in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类在控件中定义多边形作用点区域 。This class defines a polygon-shaped hot spot region in an control. 适用 于在控件中定义不规则形状的作用点区域 。The is useful for defining irregularly shaped hot spot regions in an control. 例如，您可以使用它来定义地图中的各个区域。For example, you can use it to define individual regions within a geographical map. 若要定义的区域 ，请将 属性设置为一个字符串，该字符串指定对象的每个顶点的坐标 。To define the region of a , set the property to a string that specifies the coordinates of each vertex of the object. 多边形顶点是两个多边形边缘相交的点。A polygon vertex is a point at which two polygon edges meet. 当 单击某个对象时，该页面将导航到 URL，生成回发到服务器的 post 或不执行任何操作。When a object is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到 URL，请将 属性设置为 `HotSpotMode.Navigate` ，并使用 属性指定要导航到的 url。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要回发到服务器，请将 属性设置为 `HotSpotMode.PostBack` ，并使用 属性指定对象的名称 。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, and use the property to specify a name for the object. 当单击时，此名称将在 事件数据中传递 。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. 如果希望对象没有 任何行为，请将 属性设置为 `HotSpotMode.Inactive` 。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 包含三个对象的控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains three objects. 每个 对象都表示地图上的一个地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击某个 对象时，它会回发到服务器，并且作用点的类型和名称将显示在标签中。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Class1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Class1/CS/polygonhotspot.class1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Class1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Class1/VB/polygonhotspot.class1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建 对象并将其添加到 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object and add it to an control. 控件包含其他两个 以声明方式添加的对象。The control contains two other objects that have been added declaratively. 每个 对象都表示地图上的一个地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击某个 对象时，它会回发到服务器，并且作用点的类型和名称将显示在标签中。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/CS/polygonhotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/VB/polygonhotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Coordinates { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Coordinates : string with get, set

summary.span: 表示 对象顶点的坐标的字符串。

span.span: A string of coordinates that represents the vertexes of a object.

value.span: 表示 对象的顶点坐标的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the coordinates of a object's vertexes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定对象顶点的坐标 。Use the property to specify the coordinates of the vertexes of a object. 多边形顶点是两个多边形边缘相交的点。A polygon vertex is a point at which two polygon edges meet. 指定的字符串必须使用逗号分隔的每个坐标进行格式设置。The string that you specify must be formatted with each coordinate separated by a comma. 您指定的每个顶点必须同时具有 x 坐标和 y 坐标。Each vertex that you specify must have both an x- coordinate and a y-coordinate. 例如，字符串 "128185335157510224510383228383" 定义多边形作用点为五个顶点。For example, the string "128,185,335,157,510,224,510,383,228,383" defines a polygon hot spot with five vertexes. 第一个顶点的 x 坐标为128。The x-coordinate of the first vertex is 128. 第一个顶点的 y 坐标为185。The y-coordinate of the first vertex is 185. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建 对象并将其添加到 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object and add it to an control. 属性用于指定对象顶点的坐标 。The property is used to specify the coordinates of the vertexes of the object. 控件包含其他两个 以声明方式添加的对象。The control contains two other objects that have been added declaratively. 每个 对象都表示地图上的一个地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击某个 对象时，它会回发到服务器，并且作用点的类型和名称将显示在标签中。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/CS/polygonhotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/VB/polygonhotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 返回表示 对象的顶点坐标的字符串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object.

returns.span: 表示 对象的顶点坐标的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回表示对象的顶点坐标的字符串 。The method returns a string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object. 此方法返回的字符串是属性的当前值 。The string this method returns is the current value of the property. 方法由 ASP.NET 在内部使用，用于在呈现时获取用于的坐标的文本 。The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. 返回的字符串特定于浏览器和标记语言。The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 包含三个对象的控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains three objects. 每个 对象都表示地图上的一个地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击某个 对象时，它会回发到服务器。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server. 方法检索多边形顶点的坐标，以便可以在标签中显示它们。The method retrieves the coordinates of the polygon's vertexes so that they can be displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/polygonhotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/polygonhotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]
